objects.description: Monitor network data for uncommon data flows that may be related to abuse of [Valid Accounts](https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1078) to log into a service specifically designed to accept remote connections, such as RDP, telnet, SSH, and VNC. Note: Network Analysis frameworks such as Zeek can be used to capture, decode, and alert on network service protocols such as SSH and RDP. Analytic 1 - Suspicious Protocols sourcetype="netflow" | search dest_port=22 OR dest_port=3389 OR dest_port=5900 OR dest_port=3283 // SSH, RDP, VNC, ARD
